content.p: Associate Dean of Graduate School, Faculty of Social Sciences Dr Maniam Kaliannan is Professor of Human Resource Management. He is currently teaching the following modules at undergraduate, MBA and MSc levels: a. BUSI 2167- Managing and Marketing Tourism b. BUSI 4516 - Leadership and Change Management (MBA) c. BUSI 4507 - Human Resource Management (MSc) d. BUSI4259- Managing People (MBA Singapore) e. BUSI5011 - Developing Management Research (PhD) His research interest include human resource management, talent management, knowledge management, public sector management and economics. He has presented and published his work in both conferencesâ€¦ read more telephone: +6 (03) 8924 8000 fax: +6 (03) 8924 8019
